channel.title: World 66 law rune runner
channel.description:
Hi, Im new here and I am currentily working on my powerminer (65% done)
This isn't really a request it is more of an idea that a more advanced coder might want to take on...
The script is : a world 66 law rune runner with anti-ban and anti-less-thean-27-pure-ess type of thing... if you don't know what i mean poast it and i will explain... :)[br][size=1]Posted at: December 05, 2006, 10:32:44 AM[/size][hr]come on people... :|

item.title: World 66 law rune runner
item.dc:creator: @tr3v0r TR3V0R
item.description:
@tr3v0r wrote:

Just use a law tally. Make it say “Law me!” and people will trade you pretty quickly. Make it click on where the trade would be. Make it offer them and accept and walk it back. But if you don’t use a law tally it would be really hard. I can’t do it though. I’m a noob with scar.

Read full topic

item.title: World 66 law rune runner
item.dc:creator: @lamalama lamalama
item.description:
@lamalama wrote:

Though im a noob to these forums, im actually not

I was thinking about making one

walking part and banking would be easy

tradeing is possible, but harder

finding crafter will be very hard, but is not impossible, considering they all stand in on spot and are usually high levels. people who say open will also be easy to find

However, if I ever do make this script, it will probably be expensive (2m plus)

Read full topic

item.title: World 66 law rune runner

item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

im gonna pass but thanks for the offer.

Read full topic

item.title: World 66 law rune runner

item.description:
@shock wrote:

so… Does anyone want to take this challange on ?

item.title: World 66 law rune runner
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

If you made the runner where a decent colour like gold gnome outfit. You could easily use findobj() to detect him
Then use function GetTraderName: String; as a check for the right runner Then just use all the other functions in trade.scar.
It wouldnt be that difficult.

Read full topic

item.title: World 66 law rune runner
item.dc:creator: @shock -shock-
item.description:
@shock wrote:

Akriam:

That would be extremely hard because it would have to be able to detect people. I dunno, maybe it could be done

I know a way to bypass the difficult task of “detecting people” all the script would hafto do would be : find the law altar and use that to find the co-ords for “two squares” away from that. because most of the people doing the thing stay where they are teleported when the exit the law alter. witch is ALLWAYS two squares away from the altar. once the script finds the altar it would hafto do a few calculations and BOOM there are the co-ords for the pile of people.

Read full topic
